articles.title: String of tax notices to RBI warning to consumer complaints: Long journey of Uber run-ins

articles.description: Shiv Sena Member of Parliaments in a meeting on Monday at Matoshree demanded support for NDA's presidential candidate Droupadi Murmu.

articles.title: Sri Lanka President Flown To Airbase As Exile Rumours Spread: Report
articles.description: Sri Lanka's embattled president was flown to an airbase near the main international airport Monday, officials said, raising speculation he will flee into exile abroad.
articles.content:
Several local media reports speculated the president was set to leave for Dubai later today.(File)
Colombo: Sri Lanka's embattled president was flown to an airbase near the main international airpor… [+4300 chars]

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: ‘Op Kamala a Flop’: Dinesh Gundu Rao Says BJP Tried to Do a Maharashtra with Goa Congress but Fa
articles.description: BJP’s one-point agenda is to decimate the Congress, said AICC Goa in charge Dinesh Gundu Rao. He also confirmed to News18 that Congress has 7 MLAs while Michael Lobo, Delilah Lobo, Digambar Kamat, and Kedar Naik are no longer with the party.
articles.content:
All India Congress Committee Goa in charge Dinesh Gundu Rao has called BJPs attempt to lure two-thirds of the Congress MLAs to their fold a flop Operation Kamala. 
In the process, we know who our lo… [+4390 chars]

articles.title: Fact-Checker Mohammed Zubair Sent To Jail, UP Court Denies Cops Custody
articles.description: A case was registered against Mr Zubair in Lakhimpur in September 2021 regarding a tweet against a private news channel. The complaint had been filed by a Sudarshan News employee for a tweet made by Mr Zubair on May 14, 2021.
articles.content:
The fact-checker was produced in court through video conferencing.
Lakhimpur, Uttar Pradesh: Uttar Pradesh's Lakhimpur court today refused to give fact-checker Mohammed Zubair's custody to the polic… [+1885 chars]
